scripts.docker:push: docker image push avoidwork/${npm_package_name}:latest && docker image push avoidwork/${npm_package_name}:${npm_package_version}
scripts.docker:push:windows: docker image push avoidwork/%npm_package_name%:latest && docker image push avoidwork/%npm_package_name%:%npm_package_version%
scripts.docker:release: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:version && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:release:windows: npm run docker:build:windows && npm run docker:version:windows && npm run docker:push:windows
